com.k2.Proforma

Interface Part

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPart, IndentPart, ParameterPart, Proforma, StringPart

    public interface Part
    This interface defines parts of a proforma line
    Author:
    simon

    • Method Summary

      • includeIf

        Part includeIf(com.k2.Expressions.expression.Expression<java.lang.Boolean> conditionalExpression)
        This method sets the boolean expression that defines whether the part should be included in the output
        Parameters:
        conditionalExpression - The boolean expression controlling whether or not this part should be included in the output
        Returns:
        A clone of this part with it's output controlled by the given boolean expression

      • isIncluded

        boolean isIncluded(ProformaOutput<?> po)
        Evaluate using the given ProformaOutput implementing Evaluator whther or not this part should be included in the output
        Parameters:
        po - The Proforma output evaluating the values for this profoma
        Returns:
        True if this part should be included in the output

      • write

        java.io.Writer write(int indent,
                     java.io.Writer out,
                     ProformaOutput<?> po)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Write the part to the given writer
        Parameters:
        indent - The amount of indent to prepend to proforma parts
        out - The writer on which to write the part
        po - The proforma output that will supply values for the proformas parameters
        Returns:
        The output writer for method chaining
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error writing to the writer
